lead_paragraph: PARKER--Marcia Bess. Born March 22, 1927, passed away November 18, 2015. Preceded in death by parents and sister. Survived by brother Chase Parker, Jr. Marcia lived in New York for over 50 years. She received a Masters Degree from Columbia University. She later became employed by Church Women United. As a fundraiser, she made many friends all over the United States. Marcia also made many friends at Laureate Hall where she was a tenant for around 50 years. Friends at the apartment, old and new, helped her survive a few more years while suffering with poor health. Marcia's body was donated to Columbia University Medical. 1/3
